title: Crispy Onion and Pasta Delight
description: A delightful pasta dish with a crispy onion topping, perfect for a quick and satisfying meal.

instructions.description: Cook the macarrão according to package instructions until al dente. Drain and set aside.
In a bowl, toss the sliced cebola with the farinha de trigo until well coated.
Heat the azeite in a pan over medium heat. Add the coated cebola and fry until golden and crispy, about 5-7 minutes.
Remove the crispy cebola from the pan and drain on paper towels. Season with salt and pimenta do reino.
In the same pan, add the cooked macarrão. Toss to coat with any remaining oil and season with salt and pimenta do reino as desired.
Serve the macarrão topped with the crispy cebola and a sprinkle of queijo parmesão ralado, if using.

tips: For extra flavor, add a pinch of garlic powder to the flour before coating the onions.
Try adding some fresh herbs like parsley or basil for a fresh touch.
You can substitute whole wheat pasta for a healthier option.
